name: root
description: /jaycart-backend ├─ /data-access # Repositories that handle DB operations │ ├─ productRepository.js │ └─ userRepository.js ├─ /domain # Business logic and rules │ ├─ productService.js │ └─ cartService.js ├─ /presentation # API: Controllers and routes │ ├─ controllers │ │ └─ productController.js │ └─ routes.js ├─ /models # Mongoose schemas (if using MongoDB) │ └─ productModel.js ├─ server.js # App entry point └─ package.json
